1♣1NT3♣
XPass3♠Pass
4♣1XXX2Pass
4♦3Pass4♠AP
1. limit raise or better in ♠
2. Cue bid, a ♣ stopper
3. Cue bid, a ♦ stopper
Board: 333
Dealer: S
Vul: NS
North HCP: 6
South HCP: 14

♥ 97
♦ 82

1NTAP
